data.question: What is the chemical formula of Λ-CMOF-5?
What method was used for absorption correction in X-ray diffraction data analysis?
Is the space group of Λ-CMOF-5 and Δ-CMOF-5 the same?
What is the role of NMP in the synthesis of CMOF-5?
data.answer: NMP is used as a solvent and does not induce loss of chirality in CMOF-5.

data.question: What temperature was used for the synthesis of Λ-MOF-5 and Δ-MOF-5?
Can CMOF-5 transform to MOF-5 when immersed in organic solvents?
What is the enantiomeric excess (ee) observed for both Λ-MOF-5 and Δ-MOF-5?
What happens to CMOF-5 when it is immersed in NMP?
data.answer: It undergoes a phase transformation to a racemic conglomerate of CMOF-5.

data.question: Is the synthesis of CMOF-5 dependent on the presence of proline?
What is the crystal system of [Zn(BDC)(NMP)]?
Does the synthesis of Λ-CMOF-5 and Δ-CMOF-5 require water?
data.answer: Yes, water is part of the solvent mixture.

data.question: What is the role of L-proline or D-proline in the synthesis of Λ-CMOF-5 and Δ-CMOF-5?
data.answer: They act as chiral additives to induce chirality.

data.question: What is the yield based on Zn for the synthesis of Λ-MOF-5 and Δ-MOF-5?
Is the synthesis of [Zn(BDC)(NMP)] similar to that of Λ-MOF-5 and Δ-MOF-5?
data.answer: True, except L-proline or D-proline is not used.

data.question: What is the effect of solvent exchange on CMOF-5?
data.answer: It can transform CMOF-5 to MOF-5.

data.question: What is the crystal system of Λ-CMOF-5 and Δ-CMOF-5?
Does the presence of NMP in the synthesis affect the chirality of CMOF-5?
data.answer: False, NMP does not induce loss of chirality in CMOF-5.

data.question: What analytical method was used to verify the enantiomeric nature of Λ-CMOF-5 and Δ-CMOF-5?
What is the Langmuir surface area reported for activated CMOF-5?
Can MOF-5 undergo chiral induction to form CMOF-5?
data.answer: True, especially when immersed in NMP.
